description: This file defines a Flutter widget for the dashboard screen of a kindergarten management system. It includes UI layout, data fetching, and interaction logic for displaying stats, quick actions, and recent activities.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that represents the main dashboard screen of the app.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the widget state and triggers data refresh.

methods.name: _refreshData
methods.description: Fetches and updates data for attendance, students, staff, schedules, messages, and notifications.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the dashboard UI, including stats cards, quick actions, and recent activity sections.
